summary: THE CONSUMER TOOK THE VEHICLE TO THE DEALERSHIP FOR SERVICE. THE CONSUMER WAS DRIVING THE VEHICLE HOME, WHEN WITHOUT WARNING THE VEHICLE STARTED OVER HEATING. THE CONSUMER TOOK THE VEHICLE BACK TO THE DEALER FOR INSPECTION; THE MECHANIC INFORMED THE OWNER THAT, THE ENGINE VALVES HAD FAILED. PLEASE PROVIDE ANY FURTHER DETAIL.  *JB
